t_photo_series_action::title: Series - Action
t_photo_series_action::clip_card_0::goal: Photograph an action important to your story. Frame the entire action.
t_photo_series_action::text_card_0::text: This is an action series template. A series is a set of similar images designed to illustrate a comparative point. Images in a series should be stylistically similar to further illustrate the comparison.
t_photo_series_action::clip_card_1::goal: Replicate the composition of the first photo with another character.
